availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward R. Murrell (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, merchant clerk and soldier)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, merchant clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Oma Murrell. Merchant clerk in Hartford, Ohio County 1860. Enrolled in Seventh Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford p. 787.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Ohio County, KY, 1863, p. 435, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Edward R. Murrell (September 12, 1842-March 11, 1912)," Memorial #102870941, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/102870941 (accessed January 7, 2019).
